attributes.additional_details:
If people are to receive unemployment benefits from the taxpayer, then they should be required to serve the community that is supporting them through community service.

This would result in:

1) The individuals who are in receipt of a benefit becoming a contributing member of society,

2) A more positive view of those receiving benefits from those who provide it (the tax payer),

3) The establishment of a work ethic which is required for one to move from being unemployed to being employed, and

4) A lower likelihood of mischief.
